main event: On July 19, 1960, Master Sergeant Barney I. Leyland observed a bright, metallic, circular object hovering for several minutes over Truk Atoll.
interesting points: The object was approximately 60 feet in diameter and 15 feet thick., It exhibited no visible means of propulsion., Sergeant Leyland observed the object at approximately 7:45 a.m. for about one minute., The object moved away at a high rate of speed after hovering., No other witnesses were reported for this sighting.
location: Truk Atoll, Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands
witness description: Master Sergeant Barney I. Leyland, considered reliable and intelligent.
